author: petergrossmann
title: Cardano features for everyone
description: Often things like minting, burning, tracking tokens or registering tokens in the token-registry is not accessible for non-technical users
solution: To solve the problem the opensource webapplication https://cardano-tools.io was founded to make the features accessible.
experience:
Fullstack developer for about 10 years
Creator of cardano-tools.io
Plutus pioneer
